one_reviews_text:
Quote from description:
"This experience allows you to take off as a bird with wings, fly around the lake..."

Does NOT allow you to freely move arround, it is just a bunch of 360 degree images (at a good resolution, I'll give them that) with an awkard movement system between them that requires getting back to a fixed point to switch to a diferent photo. Advertised Oculus Touch support is limited to the A button that brings you to the home point. 

I wish Oculus would check out the apps before putting false advertisments in their store. It's not an expensive app, but cheaters don't deserve financing!

Thanks for the experience Fellas.
Excellent Project.

Any plans to extend it?


I would suggest, a few little interface options.

1).  Menu Button - options, settings, and end/exit
2).  Possible to add a Location map?
3).  Seperate Volume levels for
      a). Voice,
      b). Music,
      c). Ambient.
4).  Perhaps some video tweeking options.

Very well done!

I do not hesitate to recommend this!

Visuals are good, but could have done without the music in the backround. I didn't mind the comentary though. Wish I could use the touch controllers to free fly and other options.  I also think there should be an indicator for places you have visited.
